org.cloudgraph.hbase.io

Interface DistributedWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DistributedOperation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedGraphWriter

    public interface DistributedWriter
extends DistributedOperation
    Encapsulates one or more graph table writer components for federation across multiple physical tables and/or physical table rows.

    Acts as a container for one or more TableWriter elements encapsulating a set of component table write operations for federation across multiple tables, or a single table in the most simple (degenerate) case.

    Since:
    0.5.1
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
    See Also:
    GraphTableWriter, GraphTable
